column1: #Text=Lin says : " Radio the second you see those airbenders . "
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't worry , Dad .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I just want you to know how proud I am of you .
#Text=The risk you 're taking to save the Air Nation will be remembered for generations .
#Text=" Korra says : " I love you , Dad .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I love you too , sweetheart .
#Text=" Korra says : " And Dad , watch out for Zaheer .
#Text=He 's not very fond of world leaders .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I can handle him .
#Text=" Mako says : " Must have been some fight .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako , did you see the airbenders ?
#Text=Do n't turn yourself over until I get a visual on them .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Drop your staff and surrender yourself .
#Text=Do n't make me come get you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako , what 's going on ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Tell Ghazan to let the airbenders go .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Not 'til you turn yourself over .
#Text=" P'Li says : " Do n't bother trying to metalbend out of these : they 're platinum .
#Text=We 're about to get you out of here .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , it was a trick !
#Text=" Korra says : " We had a deal !
#Text=" Mako says : " Chief , get Korra out of there .
#Text=" P'Li says : " Get the Avatar on the airship .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Nowhere to go , Zaheer !
